price: Hakika alikuwa furahani kati ya jamaa zake.
footnotes: Kwani huyo hakika duniani alikuwa furahani kati ya jamaa zake akitanaamu na pumbao alilo kuwa nalo hata akapuuza a'mali ya kuitenda kwa mustakabali wake.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
